text: Bin bɨ dɨpal okok, tap tep yɨbɨl. Binɨb ogɨnap apɨl, bɨ bel omɨŋal pɨsnep dɨpil anɨb ak ma tɨbɨlɨkɨnɨgel ak nɨm, God nɨgek gach sek ma mɨdeb. God binɨb bin bɨ dɨl, kɨdek bin si bɨ si gɨnɨgabal okok sek, binɨb yokɨp bin si bɨ si gɨnɨgabal okok sek, kɨlop takaw awl yɨbɨl ag genɨgab, yɨpɨl awl yɨbɨl ak dɨnɨgabal.
